meanings.definition: A large formal assembly of people.
meanings.sent1: The convocation gathered to celebrate the school's anniversary.
meanings.sent2: The convocation of leaders discussed important issues at the conference.
meanings.sent3: The convocation turned into a dance party when the music started playing.
meanings.sent4: The convocation of stars in the night sky was a breathtaking sight.
meanings.sent5: The convocation in the town square was a sight to behold, with people from all walks of life coming together.

meanings.definition: The action of calling people together for a meeting or ceremony.
meanings.sent1: The mayor's convocation for a town hall meeting was well attended.
meanings.sent2: The convocation of family members for the reunion was heartwarming.
meanings.sent3: The convocation of birds chirping outside made it hard to focus on work.
meanings.sent4: The convocation of clouds in the sky signaled an impending storm.
meanings.sent5: The convocation of friends for a surprise party was a great success.
